|flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = |flash2type = |fla2_num = |fla2chip = Winbond;W25X05CL; |flash2size = 0.065 |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ESMT;M15F2G16128A-BDB; |stockos = Linux;2.6.35;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.37 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Wave2, AiCloud support, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85402-11;SKY, 85402, 11;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS 5G$ |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9117A |manuf_rev = AC44-ASU |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Asuswrt-Merlin, DD-WRT, OpenWrt |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/30/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIADXX5TA3027 |asin = B00MPI5N7U |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC; |rad1chip2 = Quantenna;QT2518B; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|WFA55415|06/30/2014}} *The manufacturer stated in FCC test report is ''Compal'' (Compal Networking :[KunShan]), [http://www.arcadyan.com/contentpage.aspx?type=infocontent&L2id=10 a part of ''Arcadyan''] - same manuf. noted for [[ASUS RT-AC56U]] :([http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=153&prod2id=180 WG9117GAC]). See also [[ASUS EA-AC87]] (Arcadyan WA5005AAC44-ASU).. *The primary SoC for device is ''[[Broadcom]]'' [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 BCM4709] (ARM Cortex-A9 DualCore @1 GHz). :The 2.4GHz radio is implemented with [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4360 BCM4360], connected via PCIe to [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 BCM4709]. :The 5GHz radio is contained w/ independent ''[[Quantenna]]'' chipset (QT3840BC+QT2518B), :([http://www.quantenna.com/qsr-1000.html QSR1000], [[wikipedia:ARC (processor)|ARC]] 700 core), which is connected in some fashion (RGMII) to BCM4709. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32485-asus-rt-ac87u-dual-band-wireless-ac2400-gigabit-router-first-look ''Asus RT-AC87U - First look'' @ '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :10:C3:7B OUI on the pics shown * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32491-asus-rt-ac87u-review-part-2 ''Asus RT-AC87U Review Part 2'' @ '''SNB'''] * [http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac87u.shtml ''Asus RT-AC87U Review'' @ '''iXBT'''] : PSU: 19V 2.37A 45W [http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac87u/blockdiagram.png Block diagram] * [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/176-asus-rt-ac87u.html ''Asus RT-AC87U Review'' @ '''FoxNetwork'''] * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/asus-rt-ac87u-ac2400-r184/ ''Asus RT-AC87U AC2400 Review'' @ '''OpenITforum'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=18415 ''RT-AC87U - the platform details'' @ the '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] (''RMerlin'') :"RT-AC87U REV 1.50" board shown, an ''Arcadyan'' typical label is found on board noted :as being BCM4709 (BCM4709A0) based. ARC 700 family core used w/ ''[[Quantenna]]'' SoC, :which seems to have also been used with at least some [[Motorola VAP2500|older ''Quantenna'' SoC's]]. :SoC's/radios are segmented - 2.4 GHz is handled on BCM4360 directly connected :to the BCM4709, while 5 GHz is handled on the independent ''[[Quantenna]]'' SoC. :The ''Quantenna'' firmware is contained within the main Flash and uploaded at boot. *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=14565 ''New Asus RT-87U'' @ the '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?33092-Asus-RT-AC87U-DualBand-AC2300-Wireless-Gigabit-Router ''Asus RT-AC87U DualBand Wireless Gigabit Router'' @ '''wl500g.info'''] *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bmaylyn-networking%5D-upcoming-asus-networking-@-ces-2014-a-4524680.html ''Upcoming ASUS Networking @ CES 2014'' @ '''HardwareZone'''] * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60623 Asus RT-AC87U @ '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-588-1-1.html Images @ '''KoolShare'''] (CN) *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/21664-asus-rt-ac87u-80211ac-wave-2-the-market-for-new-flagship-wireless-router-computer-kings-125-december-2014-really-testing-team Testing @ '''TechBang'''] (CN) ===Blogs=== *[http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/01/rt-ac87u-the-ultimate-router-4x4-mu-mimo-ces-2014/ ''RT-AC87U The Ultimate Router 4×4 MU-MIMO – CES 2014''
@ '''ASUS'''' PCDiY blog] ===Press releases=== *[http://www.quantenna.com/pressrelease-01_06_14_2.html ''Quantenna Powers World’s Fastest 802.11ac Dual-Band Wave 2
ASUS RT-AC87U Router'' - '''Quantenna''' press release] ===Other=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32309-asus-ac2300-router-coming ''ASUS AC2300 Router Coming'' @ '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Wave 2, AC2300 :4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ac :802.11n: 2.4 GHz (40MHz) 4T4R 600 Mbps :802.11ac: 5 GHz (80MHz) 4T4R 1700 Mbps *[http://www.heise.de/newsticker/meldung/WLAN-mit-1700-MBit-s-2076151.html ''WLAN mit 1700 MBit/s'' @ '''heise.de'''] (DE) *[http://www.heise.de/newsticker/meldung/Erster-Chipsatz-fuer-11ac-WLAN-mit-4-MIMO-Streams-1869136.html ''Erster Chipsatz für 11ac-WLAN mit 4x4 MIMO'' @ '''heise.de'''] (DE) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = rt-ac87u build 25309 20141111 Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ac87u |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-ac87u |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=52537 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz_partly WiFi 2.4GHz partly], [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_5ghz WiFi 5GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures== *[http://www.asus.com/websites/global/products/eS2N4HnylxXIJYBB/img/hp/sec-03-1.png PCB @ '''Asus''']
